channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 09:34 Air alert in Donetsk region. Stay tuned for further reports.
item.description: 🔴 09:34 Air alert in Donetsk region. Stay tuned for further reports. #Донецка_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 08:59 Air alert in Sumy region. Follow further messages.

item.title: 🔴 08:24 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now taking place in the Pokrovsk territorial community. Take shelter!
item.description: 🔴 08:24 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now taking place in the Pokrovsk territorial community. Take shelter! #Покровська_териториальна_громада This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 06:11 Countering the threat of artillery fire in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further announcements.
item.description: 🟢 06:11 Countering the threat of artillery fire in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further announcements.
